name: Sandra Dorsett
description: Sometime around April2077, Sandra was captured byScavengers; herBiomonitormuted by a jammer chip forced into her neuroport, leavingTrauma Teamunaware of her condition.Jackie Welles,T-Bug, andVinfiltrate a Scavenger den to find her floating in an ice-filled bath. V acts quickly to remove the chip and proceeds to lift Sandra from the tub, sending her into cardiac arrest, and forcing the team into a frantic attempt at treatment with an airhypo. In the meantime, Trauma Team arrives to take custody of Sandra, leaving V and Jackie on the balcony of the Scavs' apartment. Eventually Sandra makes a...
